description:
![Screenshot of MyLifeOrganized](https://www.mylifeorganized.net/i/products/notebook.png)

MyLifeOrganized is a task manager for Windows, it provides some unique features:
  - Outline: Organize your tasks into projects and break down large tasks into subtasks until you get reasonably sized actions.
  - Projects: Mark a large task as a project to track its overall progress. Open the Projects view to easily review all your projects.
  - Workspaces: The Workspaces (tabs) are used to store and quickly access a particular configuration for the selected view, additional filter, zoom, selected task etc.
  - Markdown Support: Add headings, lists, bold, italic, links, images and other elements to task notes lightweight and easy-to-use markup language.
  - Custom Views: You can use default predefined views or create your own views using built-in MLO advanced features for filtering, sorting and grouping your tasks.
  - Sync with Google Calendar: MLO and Google Calendar can mirror each other. You can see MLO tasks distributed over the calendar and visually assess your load.
author: MyLifeOrganized
